item.description: Sheepshead evenings continue to fill, and I'd love to keep the game going! It's the best card game around, and I'm happy to share this ancient 'Sconnie secret. We run this thing potluck style - everybody brings a snack or some beer/wine, we nosh, we play cards, and we swear like sailors. It's a great time! In its most ideal form this is a 5 person game, so I'm going to keep registration to just the 5 for now. I will be happy to keep a waiting list for the event, though!

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Monday Night Cards [Sheepshead]! Novices welcome!
